summary: I'm sure people wondered about this already but I'm still very confused about it and can't get it out of my head so I'm asking...
body: I’m sure people wondered about this already but I’m still very confused about it and can’t get it out of my head so I’m asking you, people of tumblr, if you have an answer or a headcanon: how come Tony and Nebula are stuck in space in the guardians’ spaceship? In IW we saw the guardians go from picking up Thor in the darkest depths of the universe to Knowhere to Titan in LESS THAN A DAY so how come Tony and Nebula are unable to reach earth? What possibly could’ve happened for them to be adrift in space? What went wrong? I really hope this isn’t just a big plot hole

reblog.comment: I’m sure people wondered about this already but I’m still very confused about it and can’t get it out of my head so I’m asking you, people of tumblr, if you have an answer or a headcanon: how come Tony and Nebula are stuck in space in the guardians’ spaceship? What possibly could’ve happened for them to be adrift in space? What went wrong? I really hope this isn’t just a big plot hole

In IW we saw the guardians go from picking up Thor in the darkest depths of the universe to Knowhere to Titan in LESS THAN A DAY so how come Tony and Nebula are unable to reach earth? What possibly could’ve happened for them to be adrift in space? What went wrong? I really hope this isn’t just a big plot hole

title: The End
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NH2gL1

by Itsoktobedifferent

Peter is recover, and is ready to take on Spider Man. Tony does not think so.

Peter froze and smiled “Do you need a hug? I’m good at giving hugs” the boy gulped trying to lift the mood.

“No you’re good at giving me a heart attack, kid.”

Series: Part 4 of Holding By a Thread

summary: so remember in avengers when tony copied every single s.h.i.e.l.d. file ever and presumably never gave them back? well there’s...
body:
so remember in avengers when tony copied every single s.h.i.e.l.d. file ever and presumably never gave them back? well there’s probably a file on captain marvel in there. it’s probably highly classified but he got all of them. so just imagine tony going through them on a boring day and coming across it and reading through it and laughing in surprise at her listed abilities and trying to come up with a way to contact her. just imagine tony during the events of infinity war wishing that they had that woman on their team because it would make such a difference. just imagine tony knowing that if he’d had a little more time he probably could have cooked something up.

just imagine tony adrift in space, running out of oxygen and water, and hallucinating this woman in red and blue and gold flying through space and getting to their ship and forcing her way in through the hatches and making her way towards him and hauling him to his feet—and tony realizing that it’s not a hallucination, it’s not him going crazy from oxygen deprivation, she’s real, she’s real, and she’s going to get him home.

just imagine tony believing in carol danvers ok

blog.name: starkxsarcasm
blog.title: Smarts and Sass
blog.description:
"No amount of money ever bought a second of time." 
Independent RP Account for Tony Stark

summary: Iron Man 2 - Alternate Opening Okay, so this scene is gold, because this is just a great example of expectation subversion....
caption:
Iron Man 2 - Alternate Opening

Okay, so this scene is gold, because this is just a great example of expectation subversion.

Again, bypassing the unfinished special effects (Look at RDJ’s little leggys) the scene opens with Tony narrating over the studio logos, crying out in pain ad saying he’s not gonna make it. We, as the audience, are immediately like, “Oh my god, what’s gonna happen? Is he hurt? Is he dying? What’s happening?” 

But nope! Just him throwing up in a toilet! Classy!

But, after my initial giggles, I had to think. Is he puking just because he’s hungover/nervous? Or is this another side-effect of the palladium poisoning? It can obviously reek havoc on Tony’s body, as is shown throughout the movie, so maybe?

And then, the scene goes on and it’s just great. They’re talking about, what seems to be, a dangerous mission. They’re above the dropzone, Tony might not come back! All mixed in with pretty funny banter back and forth. “I’m not on my cycle, Pepper!” is still a great line.

Then he drops and we see it’s just the Expo. This is a pretty hilarious alternate opening and a perfect example of how to subvert expectations.

summary:
Warnings 
Sm*t
Knife play
Blood
Villain!Stephen
•
Tony's eyes fluttered open and he took in his surroundings. The last thing he...
body:
Ironstrange bingo 3 • sharp

Warnings

Sm*t

Knife play

Blood

Villain!Stephen



•

Tony’s eyes fluttered open and he took in his surroundings. The last thing he remembered was working a mission with the team then being Incased In a green light.


He woke up on his back tied down without his suit, and his team no where to be found. He held up his head to look around the room as much as he could.


It was plain and dull with a single window and a small TV in the corner. The only interesting thing was the arm chair in the corner that was occupied you a handsome figure. “Hello Stark.” The man smirked and Tony tested his bonds again.


“Who are you?” The man crossed his arms and stood, walking almost silently to the bed. “Let’s just say I am someone you made a little irritated. I didn’t like your team breaking into my base.” Tony’s eyes widened a little.


“Strange?” The man nodded. “I really wish we didn’t have to meet this way.” Stephen stood straight and turned to the bedside table that was out of Tony’s line of sight, hidden by a pillow.


“I’ve done some research about you Stark.” Stephen was working on something out of Tony’s sight. “You have some interesting tastes you hide from the public don’t you?”


“I don’t know what you mean.” Tony strained his neck, trying to get a better look. Stephen noticed and set down what ever he was holding, turning to Tony.


He put his fingers on Tony’s Jawline, making the restrained man shiver. Stephen’s finger’s traveled as he talked. “I think you do.” Stephen muttered, finally resting his hand against Tony’s throat and digging his nails into the soft flesh.


Tony winced but he was soon calm, biting the inside of his cheek, eyes screwed shut. Stephen pulled away. “See? Very interesting indeed.” Tony took a deep breath, willing himself to push away any unwanted urges.


“How.” His voice came out slightly raspy. “I have my ways, we can just call it magic.” Tony turned his head and looked at the wall. “Don’t worry stark, no one will find out. But I do plan on having some fun with this information.”

Tony kept his mouth shut, eyes locked on the knife, mind running wild with possibilities. Stephen tilted his head as if in thought then clicked his tongue. “To bad we will have to cut this shirt off, it’s rather nice.”

“I swear to god if you don’t get on with it.” He growled and it made Stephen chuckle. “Patience.” Stephen reclaimed the knife and softly pressed it to the flesh right above Tony’s belly button.

“Alrighty then.” Stephen leaned over Tony again and carved small designs into his chest, right over his collar bone. Tony bit his lip and failed to hold back a desperate moan.


Stephen continued his carvings and leaned down next to Tony’s ear. “Have something to say?” He whispered before biting Tony’s ear. Tony let out a quiet cry and squirmed. “No.”

blog.description: MASTERLIST || FAQ || TAGLISTS || SUBMIT || MAIN BLOG || MY AO3 || MY TWITTER || FIC REQUESTS ARE CLOSED - My name is Karina I'm a fanfiction writer and this will be my space for all things marvel and the cast. Steve/Chris and Bucky/Seb owns my heart, but I love my other heroes aswell. 100% HATE FREE ZONE!

summary: Is this a safe place for Tony stans?
question: Is this a safe place for Tony stans?
answer:
As long as you are not the kinda stan that puts hate on my Steve and Bucky posts. 

There is no Tony hate here. I don’t always agree with him. I sometimes wanna kick his ass (but to be fair that’s true about 99.9% of all characters) - I love Tony. And RDJ is my hero.

blog.title: Smarts and Sass
blog.description:
"No amount of money ever bought a second of time." 
Independent RP Account for Tony Stark

summary: Iron Man Deleted Scene - Missed You Too (2008) - Robert Downey Jr, Jeff Bridges Movie HD So, short scene, so this meta will...
caption:
Iron Man Deleted Scene - Missed You Too (2008) - Robert Downey Jr, Jeff Bridges Movie HD

So, short scene, so this meta will probably be shorter than my others, but I kinda love this scene. The quietness of it all. It’s Tony after the press conference, after all the people rushing him because they’re glad he’s alive, after he decided and announcing the change in his company and what happens after? Silence. It’s just him, his house and JARVIS. 

He’s regrouping. He’s allowing this moment to be quiet and still so he can reorient himself to his home. He’s readjusting after living in hell for 3 months to a house that has remained the same, but has it? Maybe it feels different to him, maybe there’s something that’s not the same. But everything is the same. He’s the one whose changed.

Also, what do you think Tony did to that watch after Obadiah betrayed him? Do you think he kept it? Maybe he threw it out or destroyed it, to break the last tie he had with his father-figure. I would believe that. 

Also, Tony looks so soft here. Thank you, RDJ, for that perfect performance in literally a minute and a half scene.
